content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/typeddjango/django-stubs.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository to the container
COPY . /app/

# Create and activate a virtual environment
RUN python3 -m venv .venv \
    && . .venv/bin/activate \
    && SETUPTOOLS_ENABLE_FEATURES=legacy-editable pip install -r requirements.txt

# Execute tests
RUN . .venv/bin/activate && pytest
